notes: Modern, well-maintained apartment with contemporary fixtures, recessed lighting, built-in cabinetry, and split AC units throughout. The open-plan living/dining area has clean lines and tile flooring, while bedrooms feature wood flooring. Good natural light from multiple windows with security grilles. For baby safety: hard tile floors in living area, sharp corners on dining table/counter, and one room could serve as a nursery. Overall clean condition with ample storage space.
